name: server
description: League Wins Pool Backend Sails application

scripts.//: prestart is needed when developing locally (https://github.com/brikis98/docker-osx-dev/issues/30)
scripts.prestart: echo "Node version: $(node -v)"; if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "development" ]; then echo "Installing package dependencies..." && (cd /webapp/server; npm prune; npm install) && (cd /webapp/client; bower install --allow-root; npm prune; npm install; grunt build --force); fi
scripts.start: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = "development" ]; then node app.js; elif [ "$NODE_ENV" = "production" ]; then pm2 start app.js --no-daemon; fi
